title: Good Faith Error or Deliberate Gaming of the Patent System? Qvist Alleges Elitewheels Copied Its Hub Design
content:
In a complicated international patent case, Qvist and Elitewheels have pending and approved patents in different countries for the same hub design.

Read the full article at Good Faith Error or Deliberate Gaming of the Patent System? Qvist Alleges Elitewheels Copied Its Hub Design on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
